/usr/bin/c++    -std=c++11   CMakeFiles/render_engine.dir/sources/engine/display_manager.cpp.o CMakeFiles/render_engine.dir/sources/engine/render_manager.cpp.o CMakeFiles/render_engine.dir/sources/engine/input_manager.cpp.o CMakeFiles/render_engine.dir/sources/shaders/shader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/render_engine.dir/render_engine.cpp.o  -o render_engine -rdynamic externals/glfw-3.2.1/src/libglfw3.a -lGLEW -lGLU -lGL -lrt -lm -ldl -lX11 -lpthread -lXrandr -lXinerama -lXxf86vm -lXcursor
